title: french sign
content:
This font was used on a boutique sign in Paris, France. Any thoughts?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_1358e.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019145403/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1358e.jpg) | 37.08 KB |
author: balajoni

comments.content: That looks yummy and old. I'd say lettered.

Looks old. Hand lettered. Maybe copper leaf. Wonderful old sign.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019145403/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
It is wonderful! Does anybody have any font even remotely close that comes to mind?
Well, funny enough [French Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019145403/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atfrench-script/) is kinda close.
Funny...thank you! It's close enough that I can work with it. I appreciate it!
